.
Example 1:  Applying the End-of-the-Month Rule to Reductions and Discontinuances
Situation
:  One of two parents with a spouse is being paid DIC based on $0 IVAP.  The parent reports that their spouse started receiving earned income of $600 per month on August 7, 2006.  The spouse expects to receive a total of $3,000 in earned income between August 7, 2006, and January 1, 2007.
Result
:  Adjust the award as shown in the table below:
Date
DIC Rate
IVAP
Reason
09-01-2006
$251
$3,000
Apply the end-of-the-month rule to count IVAP of $3,000 from September 1, 2006.
01-01-2007
$5
$7,200
Count $600 x 12. The DIC rate decreases on January 1, 2007. If the rate had increased, the effective date would have been February 1 because of
38 CFR 3.31
.
